train_df['Embarked'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])

test_df = pd.get_dummies(test_df, columns=['Pclass', 'Embarked'], drop_first=True)

test_features = test_df[features + ['Sex', 'Fare', 'Embarked']]

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Drop irrelevant columns (Name, Cabin)

test_df = test_df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Cabin'])

# Fill missing values

train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
train_df['Embarked'].fillna(train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

train_df['Embarked'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])

# Create dummy variables for categorical features

test_df = pd.get_dummies(test_df, columns=['Pclass', 'Embarked'], drop_first=True)

# Prepare features and target

y = train_df['Survived']

# Ensure consistent column order between train and test

test_features = test_df.reindex(columns=X.columns, fill_value=0)

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Drop irrelevant columns (Name, Cabin)
train_df = train_df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Cabin'])
test_df = test_df.drop(columns=['Name', 'Cabin'])

# Fill missing values

train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)

test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

label_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
train_df['Embarked'] = label_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])

# Create dummy variables for categorical features
train_df = pd.get_dummies(train_df, columns=['Pclass', 'Embarked'], drop_first=True)
test_df = pd.get_dummies(test_df, columns=['Pclass', 'Embarked'], drop_first=True)

# Prepare features and target

y = train_df['Survived']

test_features = test_df.reindex(columns=X_columns, fill_value=0)

test_features = test_features.apply(pd.to_numeric, errors='coerce')
